Conteudo: In light of the macroeconomic scenario and inflation prospects, the Copom decided, at the present moment, to reduce the Selic target by 50 basis points to 12.00 percent, without bias. Five votes were for the Copom monetary policy action, while two votes were in favor of reducing the Selic target by 25 basis points.The Portuguese version of the June Copom Minutes will be released next Thursday, June 14.
